title: Reports
description: Generate and download comprehensive reports for your mall operations

monthlyRevenue.title: Monthly Revenue Report
monthlyRevenue.description: Comprehensive breakdown of revenue by vendor, category, and building

vendorPerformance.title: Vendor Performance Report
vendorPerformance.description: Sales performance, ratings, and compliance metrics for all vendors

buildingOccupancy.title: Building Occupancy Report
buildingOccupancy.description: Occupancy rates, vacant units, and rental income by building

userActivity.title: User Activity Report
userActivity.description: User registrations, active users, and engagement metrics

orderAnalytics.title: Order Analytics Report
orderAnalytics.description: Order volumes, average order value, and fulfillment metrics

maintenance.title: Maintenance & Operations Report
maintenance.description: Maintenance requests, response times, and facility status

financialSummary.title: Financial Summary Report
financialSummary.description: Income statements, expense tracking, and profit margins

vendorCompliance.title: Vendor Compliance Report
vendorCompliance.description: License renewals, health inspections, and regulatory compliance

scheduled.title: Scheduled Reports
scheduled.description: Automatically generated reports sent to your email
